review.title: “Great place to work”
review.pros: Pros – 1. Very good work culture2. Great opportunities to take charge3. Freedom to innovate4. Global locations5. Fairly horizontal structure6. Great food in the workplace
review.cons: Cons – 1. One or two managers can be inexperienced for leadership role and may not be good be in people-management2. One has to be little extrovert considering the inter cultural mix that one might be exposed to
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Great work culture. Resources need to be tapped better to achieve better bottomlines

review.title: “Excellent working with NSS”
review.pros: Pros – Great team, impressive project line, tremendous work experience.
review.cons: Cons – good as career startup but not for long term career building as salaries are low as compared to market.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Plz keep up the good work.

review.title: “The company has reached a nadir and hopefully it rises again”
review.pros: Pros – At a point in time we were doing good work and there was lot of motivation combined with professional and career growth.
review.cons: Cons – There has been a decline in working ethos in certain areas with too much subjectivity
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – The company should grow and there should be growth for the employees not only for the top management to fill their coffers
